thumb.title: Cross To Heart【#VocaDuo2025】
thumb.description: 『Cross To Heart』VocaDuo2025チーム【肉体言語】制作楽曲『2人の運命が今、交わる。』Vocal:HatanoTomohiro→ https://x.com/tomohiro_hatano→ https://youtube.com/@tomohiro_hatano?si=fC4ANZYpkB9i3lR2Vocal,InstMix&VocalMix:KanaeHibiki→ https://x.com/Henyuun→ https://youtube.com/@hibikichan3150?si=xlNKRinLXnbNjtK5Music&Lyric:SOLA-G→ https://x.com/SOLAG_CiG→ https://youtube.com/@sola-g.official?si=EJILV7M1EREnTrRSGuitar:TsurugidaShun→ https://x.com/tsuru_shun07→ https://youtube.com/@tsurushun_07?si=zsjmu262AOfdb9K6Illust:KagaAyaha→ https://x.com/enjoy_ayahaya→ https://youtube.com/@enjoymixxx000?si=SThrc9O1nCUd5v7bMovie:𝙎𝙦𝙠𝙪𝙧₄¹→ https://x.com/sqr1xxx
